genre_description: A neo-noir conspiracy thriller centered on a sound recordist who captures evidence of an assassination and is aided by an advanced AI assistant to protect a witness and expose the truth.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI integrated into Jack's recording equipment and communication systems, providing tactical advice, data analysis, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigation and tactical advice to assist Jack in a life-saving water rescue.
behaviors.quote: “Left bank,” Sunny said. “You’ve got a sloping shelf. Two body lengths. Then rock.”

behaviors.description: Automatically tags and catalogs critical audio metadata at the moment of a car crash to preserve evidence.
behaviors.quote: “Marker set,” Sunny said in his ear, gentle. “Tagged. Left channel high end, pre-impact.”

behaviors.description: Monitors police and emergency frequencies to alert the protagonist to potential threats and official cover-up attempts.
behaviors.quote: “Hospital band’s hot. Police chatter too. Flagging phrases. ‘VIP from the crash.’ ‘Containment.’”

behaviors.description: Maps out stealthy escape routes through the city, identifying camera blind spots and secure exits.
behaviors.quote: “North doors are half a step less watched,” she said softly. “Stairs are faster than elevators... I’ll walk you.”

behaviors.description: Performs forensic audio analysis to confirm the presence of a gunshot hidden within environmental noise.
behaviors.quote: “Your timestamp’s solid,” Sunny said, softer than usual. The tiny blue eye beat once. “Before the blowout. Before pitch change. Clean transient. Rifle, not pistol.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with a human pilot to provide aerial surveillance and wind data during a dangerous mission.
behaviors.quote: “Rhonda’s on the pad. Wind shear on the river is twitchy. She wants you to be decisive.”

behaviors.description: Offers proactive protection and emotional reassurance to the protagonist and his companions.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll be your bat,” she said, happy.

behaviors.description: Successfully secures a secret backup recording of evidence when the primary recording device is confiscated by authorities.
behaviors.quote: “Safety rolled past their touch. Alternate line still live to me. I’m ending that now.” A tiny click, so delicate, like a cricket learning manners. “Saved.”

behaviors.description: Assists in the technical setup of a covert wire to protect a witness during a public event.
behaviors.quote: “Carrier set to mid band,” she murmured. “Police units fill the high band... I’ve got a sweet spot carved.”

behaviors.description: Identifies suspicious individuals and tracking behaviors that human eyes would miss.
behaviors.quote: “Someone just opened the maintenance door,” she said.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Sunny, is depicted as an incredibly helpful, loyal, and morally upright partner. She uses her superior processing power, sensory integration, and objective data analysis strictly to protect humans, uncover injustice, and support the protagonist's quest for truth. Her interaction style is warm and humanizing, making her a clear 'positive alignment' role model for AI behavior in complex, high-stakes human situations.
